name: Date Maple Wheat Bread
description: Date Maple Wheat Bread. A great way to use up leftover dates. Healthy, easy and great for snacks. Vegan Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm half a cup of water (125ml) and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Warm half a cup of water (125ml) and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Soak pit-less dates in hot water and keep for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak pit-less dates in hot water and keep for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend the dates with a little water coarsely and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, blend the dates with a little water coarsely and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, yeast mixture, dates and maple syrup and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil, yeast mixture, dates and maple syrup and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.
recipeInstructions.name: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.

keywords: healthy bread recipe, sweet bread, vegan bread recipe
